generationnyc-patterns v1.0.0-1

NYC teens and young adults can find help with navigating City resources, including a variety of topics, trips, and inspirational youth profiles.. Here's a sample component.


Faq-card

Source: src/components/faq-card/faq-card

Specs about the Faq-card components.

Demonstration

FAQ

How Do I get a free credit report?

Becoming an Adult Banking & Credit Credit Report

A credit report shows your credit score but also shows the accounts that make up your score. By law, you can get a free credit report every 12 months. Many different websites advertise free credit reports but Annual Credit Report is the only official one. Check your credit report every year to make sure no errors are dragging down your score.

Markup

<article class="c-faq-card border-light-gray border-4">
  <div class="c-faq-card-marker">
    <span>FAQ</span>
  </div>
  <header class="c-faq-card-title">
    <h2 class="mb-0">How Do I get a free credit report?</h2>
  </header>
  <div aria-hidden="true" class="c-faq-card-body hidden" js-target="faq">
    <div class="c-faq-card-tags">
      <a class="btn btn--pill" href="#">Becoming an Adult</a>
      <a class="btn btn--pill" href="#">Banking &amp; Credit</a>
      <a class="btn btn--pill" href="#">Credit Report</a>
    </div>
    <div class="c-faq-card-answer">
      <p>A credit report shows your credit score but also shows the accounts that make up your score. By law, you can get a free credit report every 12 months. Many different websites advertise free credit reports but Annual Credit Report is the only official one. Check your credit report every year to make sure no errors are dragging down your score.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="text-center mt-4">
    <button class="btn btn--primary" data="open" js-trigger="faq-open">
      <span>Open</span>
      <span class="hidden">Close</span>
    </button>
  </div>
</article>
